metadata.title: CVE-2013-4573 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the ZeroRatedMobileAccessextension for MediaWiki 1.19.x before 1.19.9, 1.20.x before 1.20.8, and1.21.x before 1.21.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web scriptor HTML via the "to" parameter to index.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4573` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.14+dfsg-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.19.14+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.14+dfsg-1').
